content.html: I like how people often refer to open source code as not production ready considering the absolute horrors I’ve seen in proprietary code. There’s some magical thinking that many of us are guilty that big-time company-owned projects somehow have all these quality processes.
content.value:
I like how people often refer to open source code as not production ready considering the absolute horrors I’ve seen in proprietary code. 

There’s some magical thinking that many of us are guilty that big-time company-owned projects somehow have all these quality processes.
